name: West Finland European Office, Länsi-Suomen Eurooppa-toimisto
goal:
West Finland European Office aspires to:
- Facilitate a direct link between its regions and the European Institutions;
- Find relevant European contacts and create partnerships with other European regions and relevant actors;
- Provide information on EU policies and programmes;
- Support its stakeholders's understanding about the EU and its programmes e.g. via study visits, information sessions, etc.;
- Provide intelligence and capacity building on EU funding programmes and support project building.
interests: Agriculture, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- EU funding programmes (Horizon 2020, Interreg programmes, CEF, Europe for Citizens, Erasmus+, Creative Europe, COSME, Health for Growth, EaSI, Life, ESIF)
- European Innovation Partnerships (EIP-Agri, EIP-SCC, EIP-AHA, EIP-Water)
- Industrial Policy
- Transport Infrastructure Policy (TEN-T)
- Europe 2020 strategy
- European Fund for Strategic Investments
